laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial excision in 1964; recurrence noted in 1977 with a larger macule. No areas suspicious for invasive melanoma over the next decade.
Lesion underwent Mohs surgery; central area of hypopigmentation noted in 1987.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Keratinocytic atypia consistent with actinic keratosis; atypical melanocytic hyperplasia (not sufficient for LM diagnosis)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Remained persistently treated as actinic keratosis; no conversion to LM.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Biopsy of erythema traversing skin graft
laboratory_examinations.findings: Lentigo maligna (LM) with areas suspicious for invasion, progressing to lentigo maligna melanoma (LMM)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial recurrence diagnosed as LM with possible early invasion; subsequent Mohs surgery confirmed LMM.

laboratory_examinations.findings: LM arising in a seborrheic keratosis, confirmed by biopsy
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Previous grafts reported. Mohs surgery conducted to remove LM.
